nodes.text: Zai Branen was a female Human from the planet Zakuul who served in the Knights of Zakuul during the era in which the Eternal Empire ruled over the galaxy. An elite Knight who held the title of Paladin, Branen wore dark armor and wielded a blue lightsaber and Force powers in battle. She was stationed aboard the Star Fortress over the planet Voss, and died around 3631 BBY when the Star Fortress was invaded and destroyed.

Zai Branen was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 Digital Expansion. She is one of four possible Paladins that can spawn during the Voss version of the "The Star Fortress" Flashpoint; as the Star Fortress is destroyed with all hands aboard, this article assumes that Branen died either in battle or when the battle station exploded.
